abstract: socal approaching 2 full weeks of red flag warnings .
article: southern california is entering its 11th day of red flag warnings , the longest run forecasters can remember . los angeles -- southern california is entering its 11th day of red flag warnings , the longest run forecasters can remember . red flag warnings , which signify a high risk of wildfire due to low humidity and gusty winds , are in effect and scheduled to expire at 10 a. m. friday for much of los angeles county . winds between 15 and 35 miles per hours are forecast in areas under warning , along with gusts of up to 50 mph and humidity levels as low as between 3 and 10 percent , according to a national weather service statement .

fire warnings are also in effect in several areas of ventura and santa barbara counties , where the 240,000-acre thomas fire continues to rage more than a week after it first broke out . sunny clear skies will bring temperatures of about 80 degrees to much of los angeles county thursday .
